actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to terminate the Crusader artillery system program of the Army, and for other purposes.
short_title: Crusader Termination and Deficit Reduction Act of 2002

summary.text: Crusader Termination and Deficit Reduction Act of 2002 - Directs the Secretary of the Army to terminate the Crusader artillery system program. Prohibits any further funding for such program other than for costs associated with program termination.Rescinds $100 million of Army research, development, test, and evaluation funds made available under the Department of Defense Appropriations Act, 2002, to be derived from amounts available for the Crusader program.

titles.title: Crusader Termination and Deficit Reduction Act of 2002
A bill to terminate the Crusader artillery system program of the Army, and for other purposes.
